Class OrderPizza

  • java.lang.Object
    • OrderPizza

  • public class OrderPizza
extends java.lang.Object
    The user can order a pizza, given a size and an amount of toppings.
    Sizes are Small(8"), Medium(13"), Large(21"), and Huge(34").
    The amount of toppings can range from 0 to 5 toppings.
    The price for each pizza is:
    Small $5
    Medium $8
    Large $13
    Huge $21
    Each topping is $0.89
    Tax is 9.5%
    Since:
    05 October 2014

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • askPizzaSize

        public static java.lang.String askPizzaSize()
        Asks the user for the pizza size. Default size is small.
        Returns:
        Size of the pizza. Can be a "S", "M", "L", or "H". Default is "S".

      • printPizzaSize

        public static void printPizzaSize(java.lang.String size)
        Prints the given size of a pizza to the command line.
        Parameters:
        size - The size of the pizza, given as a "S", "M", "L", or "H".

      • askToppingQuantity

        public static int askToppingQuantity()
        Ask the user for the amount of pizza topping. Can be between 0-5 toppings. 0 pizza toppings is the default value.
        Returns:
        The given quantity of pizza toppings, which can range from 0 to 5.

      • printToppingQuantity

        public static void printToppingQuantity(int toppingQuantity)
        Prints a message to the command line about the amount of pizza topping.
        Parameters:
        toppingQuantity - The amount of pizza topping to report.

      • getPizzaDiameter

        public static int getPizzaDiameter(java.lang.String size)
        Gives the diameter of the pizza size
        Parameters:
        size - The size of the pizza, given as a "S", "M", "L", or "H".
        Returns:
        The diameter, in inches, for the given size.

      • printPizzaDiameter

        public static void printPizzaDiameter(int pizzaDiameter)
        Prints a message to the command line about the pizza diameter.
        Parameters:
        pizzaDiameter - The diameter, in inches, to report.

      • getBasePrice

        public static int getBasePrice(java.lang.String size)
        Calculate the base price of the pizza. The base price of the pizza does not include toppings or tax.
        Parameters:
        size - The size of the pizza, given as a "S", "M", "L", or "H".
        Returns:
        Base price, in dollars, for the given size.

      • printBasePrice

        public static void printBasePrice(int basePrice)
        Prints a message about the base price to the command line.
        Parameters:
        basePrice - The price of the pizza, in dollars, without toppings or tax.

      • getPizzaArea

        public static double getPizzaArea(int pizzaDiameter)
        Calculates the pizza's area, in square inches, given the diameter.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The pizza's area, in square inches.

      • printPizzaArea

        public static void printPizzaArea(double pizzaArea)
        Prints a message to the command line about the pizza's area.

      • getTotalPrice

        public static double getTotalPrice(int basePrice,
                   int toppingQuantity)
        Calculate the total price of the pizza. The total price include toppings. Tax not included.
        Parameters:
        basePrice - The base price of the pizza, in dollars.
        toppingQuantity - The amount of toppings on the pizza.
        Returns:
        The total price of the pizza, not including tax.

      • printTotalPrice

        public static void printTotalPrice(double totalPrice)
        Prints a message to the command line about the total price of the pizza.
        Parameters:
        totalPrice - The total price of the pizza, in dollars, to report.

      • printPricePerArea

        public static void printPricePerArea(double totalPrice,
                     double pizzaArea)
        Prints a message to the command line about the price per square inch of pizza.
        Parameters:
        totalPrice - Total price of the pizza, in dollars, without tax.
        pizzaArea - Area of pizza, in square inches.

      • printTax

        public static void printTax()
        Prints a message to the command line about the tax for the pizza.

      • printTotalPriceWithTax

        public static void printTotalPriceWithTax(double totalPrice)
        Prints a message to the command line about the total price, tax included.
        Parameters:
        totalPrice - Price of the pizza with toppings, in dollars.
